author: Retro Game Corps
description:
I recently bought this little indie game and I'm really enjoying it.  Let's talk about what it is, how to play it, and what makes it great.

Slots & Daggers (Steam): https://store.steampowered.com/app/3631290/Slots__Daggers/

Ways to support this channel:
RGC merch: https://store.retrogamecorps.com
Stickers and magnets: https://www.ebay.com/str/retrogamecorpscharitystore
YT channel membership: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCoZQiN0o7f36H7PaW4fVhFw/join
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/retrogamecorps
Ko-Fi: https://ko-fi.com/retrogamecorps

Timestamps:
00:00 introduction
01:01 some background
01:26 how it works
05:16 the shop
06:50 the second enemy
08:08 back in the shop
09:50 round three
11:41 modifiers
13:28 the second run
15:05 later game progression
19:45 some feedback
21:38 summary and conclusion

Find me on Discord! https://discord.gg/retrohandhelds

Theme song written by Jim Gray of Our Ghosts:
https://ourghosts.bandcamp.com/track/my-first-day-at-the-retro-game-corps
